JsTrackerInstallCheck.EnterSiteUrl: Enter the URL of the page that you want to test. The page will open in a new tab and close after a few seconds.
JsTrackerInstallCheck.TestHelpText: Note: This only tests that the tracking code is loaded on the page and able to send requests to this instance of Matomo. It doesn't test any other settings or functionality.
JsTrackerInstallCheck.TestSuccessMessage: The tracking code appears to be installed and working!
JsTrackerInstallCheck.TestFailureMessage: The tracking code doesn't appear to be working.
